mapper.select:
SELECT article_no as articleNo, article_title as articleTitle, article_writer as articleWriter, article_content as articleContent, article_date as articleDate FROM article
WHERE article_no = #{articleNo}
SELECT article_no articleNo, article_title articleTitle, article_writer articleWriter, article_date articleDate FROM article ORDER BY article_date DESC

SELECT article_no articleNo, article_title articleTitle, article_writer articleWriter, article_date articleDate FROM article
article_title like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
article_writer like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
ORDER BY article_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (article_title, article_content, article_writer, article_date, article_pw) VALUES (#{articleTitle} , #{articleContent} , #{articleWriter} , NOW() , #{articlePw})
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET article_title=#{articleTitle}, article_content=#{articleContent} WHERE article_no = #{articleNo} and article_pw = #{articlePw}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM article WHERE article_no = #{articleNo} and article_pw = #{articlePw}
